Waiting strategy plays a vital role in automated web GUI testing since it significantly impacts the testing performance. Though important, little focus has been set on the waiting strategies in web GUI testing. Existing waiting strategies either wait for a predetermined time, which is not reliable in a dynamic environment, or only wait for a specific condition to be verified, which is often not …• Cites: ‪Prevalence and maintenance of automated functional tests for web …‬
